about:
Hello, my name is Nguyen Tuan Ngoc. I'm currently a fourth-year in Computer Science Engineering (CSE) at Vietnamese-German University and I fall in love with coding and programming.

 I am fluent in Python, Java, and Javascript. My field of interest's are building new Website, Software Products and enthusiastic about learning Cloud technology.
honor:

 - DAAD Scholarship for an exchange semester in Germany 2021 at Frankfurt University of Applied Sciences
 - DAAD Additional Sur-place scholarships
